title: ISic004411. Epitaph for Kratisstos
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΚΡΑΤΙΣΣΤΩ

Apparatus criticus

text of Sofia 2018

English translation

(Tomb) of Kratisstos

commentary

The standard from of the name Κράτιστος and the feminine form Κρατιστώ are attested principally in Athens, Taras and Olynthos, but also elsewhere - not however in Sicily. The open form of omega is potentially compatible with a late C4 date, but the form of the sigma is not readily paralleled so early.

bibliography

  • Bacci and Coppolino 2009 27 fig.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002171
  • Bacci et al. 2015 159 and fig.81 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002593
  • Sofia 2015 113 fig.115 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001575
  • Sofia 2018 107 no.1 and fig.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001574
